remarks: A join's first argument is less than or equal to the join.  ( ~ chub1 analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 17-Sep-2011.)
statement:
latlej.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
latlej.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
latlej.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
latlej1 $p |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> X .<_ ( X .\/ Y ) ) $.
